thumb.title: Steven Thornton, MD Dallas Knee Surgeon
thumb.description: Dr. Thornton offers a comprehensive range of surgical treatments, including knee arthroscopy, ACL reconstruction, and total knee replacement. Using state-of-the-art surgical techniques, he addresses complex problems within the knee joint, restores stability, and helps patients regain confidence in their movements. Whenever possible, he employs minimally invasive procedures to minimize scarring, reduce recovery times, and optimize outcomes.Steven Thornton, MD | Dallas Knee Surgeon7115 Greenville Ave #310 Dallas, TX 75231(214) 265-3271https://steventhorntonmd.com/dallas-knee-surgeon/
